DOC.brief_summary: primary purpose:Evaluate the prevalence and incidence of HPV infection and related diseases in subjects. Secondary purpose:Analyze risk factors of HPV infection and related diseases.
DOC.brief_title: The Epidemiologic Study of Human Papillomavirus Infection and Related Diseases
DOC.criteria: ages 18 to 55 years; residents of the study site; at least one sex partner; Be able to understand and comply with the request of the protocol. pregnant; has received HPV vaccines.
